meanings.definition: Relating to a material that generates an electric charge when mechanical stress is applied.
meanings.sent1: The piezoelectric crystal produced electricity when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The piezoelectric sensor detected movement by creating a small electric charge.
meanings.sent3: The piezoelectric floor mat lit up every time someone stepped on it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a piezoelectric reaction, lighting up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The piezoelectric effect in the device was so fascinating, it captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A device or material that exhibits piezoelectric properties.
meanings.sent1: The piezoelectric was used in the microphone to convert sound into electrical signals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the piezoelectric to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The piezoelectric in the watch made it possible to charge by movement alone.
meanings.sent4: His words acted like a piezoelectric, sparking inspiration in all who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The piezoelectric material was so versatile, it found applications in various industries.
